400.description: Max guesses already performed or invalid letter

200.description: Guess registered, returns the updated game. Idempotent on a re-guess of a letter.

404.description: Game with given id not found

id.description: id used for interacting with the game

getmaxWrongGuesses.description: The maximum number of guesses allowed before the game is considered lost

letter.description: The letter that was guessed. This may be unicode, and will be null for a 'placeholder' letter

LetterState.description: Information about a guessed or not yet guessed letter in the game

remainingWrongGuesses.description: How many more wrong guesses before the game would be failed

maskedWord.description: The actual word being guessed, with placeholders for letters that have not yet been guessed

missedGuesses.description: An array of the letters which were guessed (possibly unicode)

PlayState.description: The state of the game being played including information about guesses
